name: Slappin' Bitches
overview:
This first effort from Right Nut Games is a Tower Defense game. From MRN:

"It’s a pretty simple concept. You defend your tower from all the bitches coming at you. As each round progresses, the bitch tanks take more and more hits to destroy them. You have your cannon and missiles that will target various enemy tanks. You can set your wall integrity to change the game up a bit. Mash those buttons."

100 cartridges were sold. 10 of those were labeled "Limited Edition" and have a blue cartridge label border.
